src:
తప్పు బోర్డుది.. శిక్ష మాకా?

02 Nov 2019, 04:00




అన్నపూర్ణ మ్యారేజెస్ అన్ని కులముల వారికి పెళ్లి సంబంధములు చూడబడును.www.annapurnamarriages.com
Ph: 88865 47666ప్రవేశం ఉచితం ADVT


‘గ్రూప్‌-3 కీ’ పై అభ్యర్థుల ఆవేదన


అభ్యంతరాలను పట్టించుకోని ఏపీపీఎస్సీ


తెలుగు మీడియం వారికి అన్యాయం


ఏలూరు, నవంబరు 1(ఆంధ్రజ్యోతి): ఏపీపీఎస్సీ విడుదల చేసిన ‘రివైజ్డ్‌ కీ’ చూసిన గ్రూప్‌-3 అభ్యర్థులు ఖిన్నులైపోయారు. తమ అభ్యర్థనలను పట్టించుకోకుండా తోచిన విధంగా రివైజ్డ్‌ కీని ప్రకటించిందని ఆవేదన చెందుతున్నారు. మైనస్‌ మార్కుల విధానంలో నిర్వహించే పోటీ పరీక్షల్లో 0.01 మార్కులు తలరాతలు మార్చేస్తాయని, అలాంటిది 20, 30 ప్రశ్నలు, జవాబులు తప్పుగా ఇచ్చి అభ్యర్థుల జీవితాలతో బోర్డు చెలగాటమాడుతోందని ఆరోపిస్తున్నారు. ‘ప్రాథమిక కీ’లోని 30 ప్రశ్నలపై అభ్యంతరాలు వ్యక్తం చేయగా ‘రివైజ్డ్‌ కీ’లో 7 మాత్రమే సరిచేసి చేతులు దులుపుకొందని మండిపడుతున్నారు. చేయని నేరానికి తాము శిక్ష అనుభవిస్తున్నామని అభ్యర్థులు అంటున్నారు. ఒక ప్రశ్నకు ఒకేలా ఉండే 2, 3ఆప్షన్లు ఇవ్వడం, ఇంగ్లీషులో ఒకలాగా, తెలుగులో ఒకలాగా ప్రశ్నించడం, ఇంగ్లీషులో ఆప్షన్లకు, తెలుగు ఆప్షన్లకు పొంతన లేకుండా ఉండడం, అర్థరహితమైన ప్రశ్నలు ఇవ్వడం, ఒకే ఆన్సర్‌ రెండు మూడు ఆప్షన్లలో ఇవ్వడం వంటి తప్పులు ఏపీపీఎస్సీ చేసిందని ఆరోపిస్తున్నారు. దీంతో దాదాపు 30 ప్రశ్నలు ముట్టుకునే సాహసం చేయలేకపోయామని అంటున్నారు. ఇప్పుడు వాటికి రెండు మూడు ఆన్సర్లలో ఏది గుర్తించినా రైటేననటపై తీవ్ర ఆవేదన వ్యక్తం చేస్తున్నారు. ‘రివైజ్డ్‌ కీ’లో ఇప్పటికీ సరిచేయాల్సిన ప్రశ్నలు దాదాపుగా 10కి పైగా ఉన్నాయంటున్నారు. ఏపీపీఎస్సీ చేసిన తప్పులు, అనువాద దోషాల వల్ల తాము బాగా నష్టపోయామని గ్రామీణప్రాంత తెలుగు మీడియం అభ్యర్థులు వాపోతున్నారు. రివైజ్డ్‌ కీ విడుదల చేయడానికి నెలన్నర సమయం తీసుకుని, అభ్యంతరాలకు మాత్రం 4రోజులే గడువు ఇవ్వడం ఏంటని అభ్యర్థులు మండిపడుతున్నారు. కేవలం పోస్టు ద్వారా చేయాలని నిబంధన పెట్టడం, మధ్యలో ఆదివారం సెలవు ఉంటుందన్న విషయం పట్టించుకోకుండా సోమవారం వరకూ గడువు ఇవ్వడం పట్ల తీవ్ర ఆగ్రహం గడువు పెంచాలని, అభ్యంతరాలను చిత్తశుద్ధితో పరిశీలించి సరిచేయాలని వారు డిమాండు చేస్తున్నారు.
text:
November 2 horoscope for all signs

02 Nov 2019, 04:55

Today is 2 november 2019 - the 306th day of the year in the Gregorian calendar. The first half of this day will be more favorable than the second, so it’s better to do important things before lunch. In the morning, communication will develop successfully, especially if you more often begin to show personal charm. Short trips and business meetings will be successful. There will be more opportunities for flirting. Various surprises are not excluded, but now they will help the realization of your plans, and not interfere with them. In the afternoon it will be more difficult to determine your desires, and the opening prospects may turn out to be illusory.
AriesToday you will have an enthusiastic fan, and he will praise you in front of everyone who will be ready to listen. Try not to blush too much. Such a wave of flattery can confuse you at first, but after you accept praise all day, you will begin to like the feeling of recognition of your work - it will be a great feeling. For your vanity, this will serve as an impetus, which means that it is a great time for new projects. It will be impossible to stop you. Taurus Today you will speak with someone whom you had completely ignored before. It will not be a surprise to anyone that in the end you will get extreme pleasure from this experience. This person attracted your attention by looking at life from an unconventional perspective. You will have a chance to learn something new, regardless of his culture, past or financial situation. He will be able to tell you something that you never knew about this world. Gemini. You will have an easy day. If you want, you can safely put your loaded brain on autopilot, especially when it comes to your daily duties. You have already impressed everyone you needed, so don’t worry about your reputation. Thanks to this lightness, you will be in a good mood all day. Cancer Today no one will come to you and ask about your ideas. If you want to realize your plans, you need to take the initiative and start the discussion first. Choose the appropriate method for this. Everything that you say today will be heard and taken seriously. Be bolder! There is nothing wrong with being prudent from time to time. Promote your plan more actively. Leo Keep calm no matter what happens. It is unrest and anxiety that can cause mistakes, false steps, which you will soon regret. It will not be easy to focus on work: too often you are distracted, they suggest discussing new projects. The ideas of colleagues and partners may seem tempting, but before talking about them, you need to solve current problems. It is advisable to reduce costs, abandon rash and optional purchases. Possible cash receipts, probably the return of old debts. Virgo Take a look in your closet and count things that you never wore? Most likely they were all impulsive purchases, weren't they? When today you see what you think you should definitely have, remember these forgotten outfits. Think about how much money you could have now if you could then resist your impulse. Don’t waste money on what you don’t need. Libra Perhaps you are angry with the whole world and dream that everyone will leave you alone and not demand a decision that you are not ready for. However, you have a choice on how to proceed. For example, stop all activities and just relax. You will certainly find someone with the same mood as you who can keep you company. You deserve a rest day. Try to stay away from what or who annoys you so much. Scorpio Today, every word you utter will be rock solid and undeniable. This doubly concerns the emotional issues that will arise before you in the first place. Fortunately, now is the right time to have a heart-to-heart talk with the person you love the most. Stop mumbling something illegible and start talking. Call if necessary and clarify all questions. After that, you will feel much better. Sagittarius The stars have their own plan. They want you to get closer to your friends and loved one even more than before, which says a lot, given the emotionality and passion of your sign. Perhaps you will speak openly and finally resolve a long-standing dispute. It doesn’t matter if you apologize or accept - everything will end with a classic happy ending. Capricorn If you have been engrossed in a new romance in the last few days or even weeks, then it's time to introduce your partner to your friends and relatives. If you are very proud of your beloved, then be late for a general meeting for a few minutes so that your appearance is as noticeable as possible. After all, it’s not in vain that this is called “spectacular lateness.” Aquarius The representatives of your sign are much brighter than others, such qualities as discipline, self-control and discretion are expressed. Nevertheless, now it will be very easy to persuade you to take a break from work. And even less effort will be needed if you are persuaded by a person with whom you would very much like to spend several hours alone. Agree boldly, and there is no need to feel guilty about it. Fishes Today is a great day to start projects that will contribute to positive changes in household chores. Do what you know and can do. Paint the walls of the room. Repair a leaking tap. Put your wardrobe in order. And then arrange with a professional to come and take care of the rest. You risk making a difficult situation worse if you try something you don’t know how to do. Source: https://astro-ru.ru
Author Elena Kruglova
